q: Is this platform free to use?
a: Yes! You can solve problems, track your progress, and learn—all for free. Some advanced features may be added later.

q: What kind of problems do you offer?
a: We offer DSA problems across topics like arrays, strings, graphs, DP, and more—organized by difficulty and company.
